name: LINE-JBot
description: A simple LINE bot using Node.js

PREFIX.description: symbol to initiate the bot command. if leaved blank it will use point(.) as the prefix

ACCESS_TOKEN.description: LINE channel access token for the bot (read LINE API documentation for more info)

CHANNEL_SECRET.description: LINE Channel secret code for the bot (read LINE API documentation for more info)

SEARCH_ENGINE.descrption: image search engine to use ( google / yandex)
